JasperTemplate.name: GridReport
JasperTemplate.DesignXml: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <jasperReport xmlns="http://jasperreports.sourceforge.net/jasperreports" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:schemaLocation="http://jasperreports.sourceforge.net/jasperreports http://jasperreports.sourceforge.net/xsd/jasperreport.xsd" name="GridReport" pageWidth="792" pageHeight="595" orientation="Landscape" whenNoDataType="AllSectionsNoDetail" columnWidth="732" leftMargin="30" rightMargin="30" topMargin="20" bottomMargin="20"> <property name="ireport.scriptlethandling" value="0"/> <property name="ireport.encoding" value="UTF-8"/> <property name="ireport.zoom" value="1.0"/> <property name="ireport.x" value="0"/> <property name="ireport.y" value="0"/> <import value="net.sf.jasperreports.engine.*"/> <import value="java.util.*"/> <import value="net.sf.jasperreports.engine.data.*"/> <style name="title" isBlankWhenNull="true" fontName="Arial" fontSize="24" isBold="true"/> <style name="bandedText" mode="Opaque" forecolor="#000000" backcolor="#FFFFFF" isBlankWhenNull="true" fontName="Arial" fontSize="9"> <box topPadding="3" leftPadding="5" bottomPadding="3"> <topPen lineWidth="0.0" lineStyle="Solid" lineColor="#FFFFFF"/> <bottomPen lineWidth="1.0" lineStyle="Solid" lineColor="#DDDDDD"/> </box> <conditionalStyle> <conditionExpression><![CDATA[new Boolean($V{REPORT_COUNT}.intValue() % 2 == 0)]]></conditionExpression> <style backcolor="#EEEEEE"/> </conditionalStyle> </style> <style name="spBlue" mode="Opaque" forecolor="#FFFFFF" backcolor="#1A7182" markup="none" isBlankWhenNull="true" fontName="Arial" fontSize="9" isBold="true"> <box topPadding="3" leftPadding="5"/> </style> <style name="footer" forecolor="#000000" fontName="Arial" fontSize="10"/> <style name="table"/> <style name="table 1"> <box> <pen lineWidth="1.0" lineColor="#000000"/> </box> </style> <style name="table 1_TH" mode="Opaque" backcolor="#F0F8FF"> <box> <pen lineWidth="0.5" lineColor="#000000"/> </box> </style> <style name="table 1_CH" mode="Opaque" backcolor="#BFE1FF"> <box> <pen lineWidth="0.5" lineColor="#000000"/> </box> </style> <style name="table 1_TD" mode="Opaque" backcolor="#FFFFFF"> <box> <pen lineWidth="0.5" lineColor="#000000"/> </box> </style> <subDataset name="Table Dataset 1"/> <parameter name="headerRowTableDS" class="net.sf.jasperreports.engine.JRDataSource" isForPrompting="false"/> <parameter name="GridReportHeaderRow" class="net.sf.jasperreports.engine.JasperReport" isForPrompting="false"> <parameterDescription><![CDATA[GridReportHeaderRow]]></parameterDescription> </parameter> <parameter name="summaryTableDS" class="net.sf.jasperreports.engine.JRDataSource" isForPrompting="false"/> <parameter name="chartDS" class="net.sf.jasperreports.engine.JRDataSource" isForPrompting="false"/> <parameter name="GridReportSummary" class="net.sf.jasperreports.engine.JasperReport" isForPrompting="false"> <parameterDescription><![CDATA[GridReportSummary]]></parameterDescription> </parameter> <parameter name="GenericListSubReport" class="net.sf.jasperreports.engine.JasperReport" isForPrompting="false"> <parameterDescription><![CDATA[GenericListSubReport]]></parameterDescription> </parameter> <parameter name="reportDefName" class="java.lang.String"/> <parameter name="summaryTitle" class="java.lang.String"/> <background> <band splitType="Stretch"/> </background> <title> <band height="299" splitType="Stretch"> <textField isBlankWhenNull="false"> <reportElement key="textField-7" x="0" y="0" width="729" height="38"/> <box> <topPen lineWidth="0.0" lineStyle="Solid" lineColor="#000000"/> <leftPen lineWidth="0.0" lineStyle="Solid" lineColor="#000000"/> <bottomPen lineWidth="0.0" lineColor="#000000"/> <rightPen lineWidth="0.0" lineStyle="Solid" lineColor="#000000"/> </box> <textElement> <font size="24" isBold="true"/> </textElement> <textFieldExpression><![CDATA[$P{reportDefName}]]></textFieldExpression> </textField> </band> </title> <pageHeader> <band splitType="Stretch"/> </pageHeader> <columnHeader> <band height="27" splitType="Stretch"/> </columnHeader> <detail> <band height="20" splitType="Prevent"/> </detail> <columnFooter> <band splitType="Stretch"/> </columnFooter> <pageFooter> <band height="22" splitType="Stretch"> <textField isStretchWithOverflow="true" evaluationTime="Report" pattern="EEEEE dd MMMMM yyyy hh:mm a" isBlankWhenNull="false"> <reportElement key="textField-1" x="0" y="8" width="290" height="14"/> <box> <topPen lineWidth="0.0" lineStyle="Solid" lineColor="#000000"/> <leftPen lineWidth="0.0" lineStyle="Solid" lineColor="#000000"/> <bottomPen lineWidth="0.0" lineColor="#000000"/> <rightPen lineWidth="0.0" lineStyle="Solid" lineColor="#000000"/> </box> <textElement verticalAlignment="Bottom"/> <textFieldExpression><![CDATA[new java.util.Date()]]></textFieldExpression> </textField> <line> <reportElement key="footerBlackLine" x="0" y="1" width="722" height="1"/> </line> <textField evaluationTime="Page" pattern="" isBlankWhenNull="false"> <reportElement key="textField-14" style="footer" x="587" y="4" width="80" height="14"/> <box> <topPen lineWidth="0.0" lineStyle="Solid" lineColor="#000000"/> <leftPen lineWidth="0.0" lineStyle="Solid" lineColor="#000000"/> <bottomPen lineWidth="0.0" lineColor="#000000"/> <rightPen lineWidth="0.0" lineStyle="Solid" lineColor="#000000"/> </box> <textElement textAlignment="Right" verticalAlignment="Bottom"/> <textFieldExpression><![CDATA[msg($R{rept_current_page}, $V{PAGE_NUMBER})]]></textFieldExpression> </textField> <textField evaluationTime="Report" isBlankWhenNull="false"> <reportElement key="textField-15" x="672" y="4" width="50" height="14"/> <textElement verticalAlignment="Bottom"> <font fontName="Arial"/> </textElement> <textFieldExpression><![CDATA[msg($R{rept_current_page_of}, $V{PAGE_NUMBER})]]></textFieldExpression> </textField> </band> </pageFooter> <summary> <band splitType="Stretch"/> </summary> </jasperReport>
